entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
